name: Shot Aground
description:
Your Spaceship got shot down. Defend yourself and explore that dusty land.

Web build over here: primaerfunktion.itch.io/shot-aground/

You can read the Changelog over here.

This is a two week prototype for Space Cowboy Game Jam.
